text: The Phoenix Dwarf is a galaxy discovered as a mistaken globular cluster. It's correctly 1.14 Mly away the Earth == Characteristics-special features== It has got some young stars inside it in east-west direction and the oldest are in north south direction. It seems that it's one of the Milky Way's satellite galaxies. ==Related pages== * Phoenix (constellation) * Dwarf galaxy == References == ==Other websites== * * Phoenix Dwarf Galaxy * Stellar populations in the Phoenix dwarf galaxy * Phoenix Dwarf Category:Galaxies
title: Phoenix Dwarf
